name: Roblox - At Night [Alpha]
description: A dark overhaul of the Roblox website.

user.name: Artex
user.about: Overtime I get tired of looking at ugly websites, so I do what I can to spruce them up. I can be found at Twitter FurAffinity DeviantArt My Scripts OpenUserJS

additional_info: This theme only affects Roblox's recently designed pages. Those currently include: Home, games, profile, friends, and inventory pages. Other pages aren't included because they're a pain to work with. I'll try to keep the theme up to date, which shouldn't be hard. update [12/30/15]: Some of the affected pages require touch-ups. I'm not actively working on this style right now, but I may get back to it at some point.
